comment._content: Opposite: Etablissement Duval, to the right Hotel de Lorraine, to the left possibly Restaurant a Coeur Doux. This seems to be in the vicinity of the Brasserie Bougeneaux (see the comment to the picture below) but if so this looks very different today.
